header.confirm-clear: All counters will be removed if you click ‘OK’ button.

rejection.name: "Name" should not be empty or duplicated.
rejection.range: "Initial/Maximum/Minimum value" should be safe integers, where (Minimum value) <= (Initial value) <= (Maximum value).
rejection.value: "Value" should be a safe integer within the correct range.
rejection.initial: "Initial value" should be a safe integer within the correct range.
rejection.min: "Minimum value" should be a safe integer within the correct range.
rejection.max: "Maximum value" should be a safe integer within the correct range.
rejection.step: "Counter step" should be a positive safe integer.
